titleStmt.title: The present condition of Dublin in Ireland; with the manner of the siege, and how it is straitened, by the Marquesse of Ormond, L. Inchequin, &c. / Represented in two letters, from a Colonell in Dublin, to his brother a merchant in London. Dated at Dublin, June 22. 1649.
titleStmt.author: R. C.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Crips, and Lodowick Lloyd,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
